snippet: The Air Force said it would base its new F-35 fighter plane at Burlington International Airport despite community complaints.
abstract: Air Force says it will base its new F-35 fighter plane at Burlington International Airport in Vermont, despite complaints that the planes would be too noisy and pose a risk to the community.
lead_paragraph: The Air Force said it would base its new F-35 fighter plane at Burlington International Airport despite community complaints.

headline.main: Vermont: Burlington Will Get Fighter Jets
headline.print_headline: Vermont: Burlington Will Get Fighter Jets
